data.name: Blueplanet VR
data.detailed_description:
V2.0 Released

Version 2.0 brings these enhancements: - Reorganization of home lobby featuring scene categories and training videos. - Language localization support for English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Korean, and Japanese. - New orientation table in each scene with further contextual information and additional interactive features placed in many scenes. - Omitted panoramic galleries, added 2 new volumetric scenes, Fissures and Mojave Cave. - New orientation glider icon added to gliding scenes. - Performance gains with faster scene loading. - New pricing of $24.95.


About the Game

Blueplanet VR is a curated collection of over 40 volumetric experiences of powerful scenic and cultural heritage locations worldwide, ranging from Borobudur Temple in Indonesia to Bears Ears National Monument in the southwestern US. With a high level of photogrammetry execution and art direction, BPVR offers the viewer a strong sense of presence and open exploration within these remarkable locations, some even offering hang gliding flight experiences over spectacular terrains. Interactive features are used to deepen understanding and insight of these fascinating and unique locations. A free demo is available with 4 sample scenes to explore.

Blueplanet VR is a curated collection of over 40 volumetric experiences of powerful scenic and cultural heritage locations worldwide, ranging from Borobudur Temple in Indonesia to Bears Ears National Monument in the southwestern US. With a high level of photogrammetry execution and art direction, BPVR offers the viewer a strong sense of presence and open exploration within these remarkable locations, some even offering hang gliding flight experiences over spectacular terrains. Interactive features are used to deepen understanding and insight of these fascinating and unique locations.

A free demo is available with 4 sample scenes to explore.
data.short_description: Blueplanet VR is a new way to experience strong presence in some of the world's most remarkable locations.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 ti
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
